page.title: 13TRAFFIC IN AMMANFORD
page.content:
A traffic count was carried out for half an hour on a Friday morning, on Ammanford Square.The A474, A483(T), and a minor road form a crossroads in the town centre.Traffic lights and Pelican crossings control the flow of traffic through the square. The survey count was as follows: {Vans + { Cars:lorries:M/Bykes:Buses {Wind St. }180 40 3 4 {High St. }122 30 4 0 {Quay St. }113 26 2 1 {College St.}147 28 3 2
From this, we find market day is a very busy day.We see there are many vans + lorries passing through but few buses serve the area. The M4 motorway,5 miles to the south has led much traffic away from the town and villages.
